adventure_overview: Tigers will explore math through the discovery of art and how shapes and symbols can tell a story. Prior to any activity, use Scouting America SAFE Checklist to ensure the safety of all those involved. All participants in official Scouting America activities should become familiar with the Guide to Safe Scouting and applicable program literature or manuals.

activities.name: Art Trail
activities.description: Take a walk in a neighborhood with public art such as outdoor murals, statues, and sculptures.

activities.name: Virtual Tour of Art
activities.description: Coordinate a virtual tour of the Van Gogh Museum in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

requirements.text: Look closely at art or a picture of art with your den or Tiger adult partner. Decide what you like about the art, and share your ideas with your den, family or Tiger adult partner.

activities.name: Art on Display part 2
activities.description: This activity is designed to be done in combination with requirement 1 and the Art on Display activity at an art museum.

activities.name: Art Trail part 2
activities.description: This activity is designed to be done in combination with requirement 1 and the Art Trail activity.

activities.name: Virtual Tour of Art 2
activities.description: This activity is designed to be done in combination with requirement 1 and the Virtual Tour of Art activity.

requirements.text: Create a piece of art using shapes.

activities.name: My Art From Shapes
activities.description: Using the shapes in the Tiger Handbook (page 55) make a piece of art.

activities.name: Spiral Art
activities.description: Make a drawing using a spiral stencil set.

requirements.text: Learn how to spell your name in Braille and sign language.

activities.name: Get To Know Me and Sign Language
activities.description: Invite someone who is deaf or an interpreter for the deaf to visit the den.

activities.name: Reading with Your Hands
activities.description: Using puffy round stickers spell your name in braille.

activities.name: The Art of Sign Language
activities.description: Cub Scouts will learn about American Sign Language and how to sign their name.
